title: Nightfall
description: Forbidden love, yearning desire, and seduction will leave you breathless in this New Adult Paranormal Romance. Born from an ancient voodoo priestess clan, Alexandra Leveau falls in love with sexy vampire Vadim Blerinc. But these two are a dangerous match, and making love could literally kill them. And then local townies begin to die. Can Alexandra and Vadim save the people around them? Can they overcome the curse that has hung over their families for centuries? Can true love conquer bad blood? Extra Information: a few 18+ scenes
author: Lois H. Gresh
